name: Hollow Depths
description:
Hollow Depths

Created by:

  • Melanie Cole
  • Destiny Nieves
  • Samiyyah Rucker
  • Kang Xiong

The water is rising, fast. Air bubbles can prolong life a little, but for our snorkel-geared hero the only option is to escape before the area is completely submerged.

Puzzles, platforming challenges, and the timer are all conspiring to make this adventure an amazing amount of fun.

Download now and start your ascent toward the surface.
